name: FIGHT! (um3k)
description:
Just a basic fighting game, made primarily to test an idea for the HP bars, but of course I had to put some actual gameplay in there. It's pretty lousy as far as fighting games go, the AI is worthless, the physics are abominable, and the controls are unresponsive. The fireball takes 5 seconds to recharge, and does 4x as much damage as melee.

Controls:

L/R: Move

Up: Jump

A (z): Punch

B (x): Kick

SELECT (shift): Fireball
